Header.title: Where Ideas Roam Freely
Header.paragraph: The Decentralized Censorship Resistant Content Platform

About.paragraph: We provide a censorship resistant decentralized platform for all users and creators.

Services.name: Decentralized
Services.text: Rogan is powered by peer-to-peer technology that can not be stopped.

Services.name: Censorship resistant
Services.text: Our platform can not be censored by third parties. And we donâ€™t rely on third parties for funding.

Services.name: User and creator protection
Services.text: We protect the privacy and the freedom of speech of all of our members.

Services.name: Opensource
Services.text: Rogan is an open-source project that welcomes anyone to inspect or cooperate on.

Services.name: Fair
Services.text: Rogan does not take sides or discriminate. Only the users have the ability to take down things that are illegal or life threatening.

Services.name: Free to use
Services.text: Rogan is free to use and Ad free, we use to power of blockchain to fund ourselves. This how we stay independent.
